JobFullDesc: Are you interested in working in a dynamic environment that offers opportunities for professional growth and new responsibilities? Are you interested in helping clients drive alignment with their business, improve organizational and human resource performance and establish a culture focused on adding business value? That is what the new generation of human resource transformation is all about. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to advise Government and Public Services (GPS) clients through critical and complex issues, while allowing you to develop personally and professionally, consider a career in Deloitte's Human Capital practice. Work you'll do  As a Payroll & Workforce Management Senior Consultant, you will:  Organize and deliver services on a cross-section of Payroll & Workforce Management projects  Apply your experience from having lead at least 1 full life cycle in Workday Payroll, SAP Payroll or Oracle Payroll.  Work with team members and support delivery teams and staff  Give presentations to clients or other decision makers in order to sell ideas to various audiences (technical and non-technical)  Participate in Pre-sales, proposal, and RFP initiatives  Mentor junior staff, lead requirements gathering workshops, and/or facilitate meetings,  Utilize your superior knowledge of the HR function and processes to deliver project s The team Deloitte's Government and Public Services (GPS) practice - our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. Serving federal, state, & local government clients as well as public higher education institutions, our team of over 15,000+ professionals brings fresh perspective to help clients anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill their mission promise. The HR Transformation offering (HRT) transforms the way HR enables the business and the workforce. In this world of disruption, we believe that HR has an opportunity to take the lead and own enterprise-wide issues for the organization. From the creation of HR strategy using our leading Oracle-enabled HR Transformation labs, the application of design thinking that allows HR to challenge how work gets done today, to navigating the ever-evolving HR technology landscape to determine the right digital solutions to enable transformation, our HR Transformation practice is focused on helping HR take the lead. Qualifications  Required:  Bachelor's degree required  Prior consulting experience  5 years of overall experience, preferably experience in a WFM consulting capacity to federal, state or local government sectors or the higher education sector  Experience with Oracle Payroll, SAP Payroll or Workday Payroll  Experience leading the full life cycle of a project or workstream (e.g. business analysis, functional specification, system configuration, design, & testing  Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future  Must be able to obtain and maintain the required clearance for this role  Travel up to 80% (While 80% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice)  Preferred:  Prior Big Four Consulting Experience  Federal, state, local government or higher education sector(s) consulting experience
